title: Why Academia Is So Left-Wing
description:
Academia is well-known for being massively left-wing. There is also substantial evidence suggesting a correlation between IQ and 'leftness', which is often pointed out by snarky progressives. However, this video explores why this might be and why intelligence alone is not a good indicator of political wisdom.
